cases.title: Cryo Sculpting
cases.procedure_info:
1. Consultation
    • A qualified provider will assess your goals, target areas, and suitability for Cryo Sculpting.
    • Ideal candidates are close to their ideal weight with localized fat pockets.
  2. Preparation
    • The treatment area is cleaned and marked.
    • A protective gel pad is placed on the skin to prevent frostbite or irritation.
    • The applicator is positioned on the area and suction is applied to pull the fat into the cooling chamber.
  3. Cooling Process
    • Controlled cooling is delivered to the fat cells for approximately 35 to 60 minutes per area.
    • You may feel intense cold, pulling, or tingling initially—this usually fades as the area becomes numb.
  4. Post-Treatment Massage
    • After the applicator is removed, the area may be massaged for a few minutes to enhance fat breakdown and circulation.
cases.description:
Cryo Sculpting is a non-invasive body contouring treatment designed to reduce stubborn fat by using controlled cooling technology. Also known as cryolipolysis, this procedure targets and freezes fat cells beneath the skin without damaging surrounding tissues. Over the following weeks, the frozen fat cells are naturally eliminated by the body, resulting in a slimmer, more sculpted appearance.

It’s ideal for individuals who are near their ideal weight but struggle with localized fat deposits in areas like the abdomen, flanks (love handles), thighs, back, upper arms, or under the chin. Cryo Sculpting requires no surgery, no needles, and no downtime, making it a popular choice for safe and effective fat reduction.
cases.content:
Cryo Sculpting is a non-invasive body contouring treatment designed to reduce stubborn fat by using controlled cooling technology. Also known as cryolipolysis, this procedure targets and freezes fat cells beneath the skin without damaging surrounding tissues. Over the following weeks, the frozen fat cells are naturally eliminated by the body, resulting in a slimmer, more sculpted appearance.

It’s ideal for individuals who are near their ideal weight but struggle with localized fat deposits in areas like the abdomen, flanks (love handles), thighs, back, upper arms, or under the chin. Cryo Sculpting requires no surgery, no needles, and no downtime, making it a popular choice for safe and effective fat reduction.

cases.title: Skin Biopsy
cases.procedure_info:
Preparation:
  • The area to be biopsied will be cleansed with an antiseptic.
  • Local anesthesia (typically lidocaine) is injected to numb the site, so you won’t feel pain during the procedure.
Biopsy Technique (chosen based on lesion type and location):
  • Shave Biopsy: A thin layer of the lesion is shaved off with a scalpel.
  • Punch Biopsy: A small, circular tool is used to remove a core of skin, including deeper layers.
  • Excisional Biopsy: The entire lesion is removed with a scalpel, often requiring stitches.
Duration:
  • The procedure typically takes 15 to 30 minutes, including preparation and dressing.
cases.description: A skin biopsy is a minor procedure in which a small sample of skin is removed and sent to a laboratory for microscopic examination. It is commonly performed to diagnose or rule out skin conditions such as skin cancer, inflammatory skin disorders, infections, or unusual growths. Depending on the lesion and location, your dermatologist may use different techniques like shave biopsy, punch biopsy, or excisional biopsy. The procedure is typically quick, done under local anesthesia, and involves minimal discomfort with little to no downtime.
cases.content: A skin biopsy is a minor procedure in which a small sample of skin is removed and sent to a laboratory for microscopic examination. It is commonly performed to diagnose or rule out skin conditions such as skin cancer, inflammatory skin disorders, infections, or unusual growths. Depending on the lesion and location, your dermatologist may use different techniques like shave biopsy, punch biopsy, or excisional biopsy. The procedure is typically quick, done under local anesthesia, and involves minimal discomfort with little to no downtime.

cases.title: CoolSculpting
cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
CoolSculpting is a non-invasive fat reduction treatment that uses controlled cooling to freeze and eliminate stubborn fat cells in targeted areas like the abdomen, thighs, flanks, and arms. It's ideal for people close to their ideal weight but struggling with pockets of fat that don’t respond to diet or exercise.

How long it lasts:
Results are long-lasting, as treated fat cells are permanently destroyed. Visible results usually appear within 1 to 3 months after treatment.

Results:

  • Up to 20–25% fat reduction in treated areas

  • No surgery, needles, or downtime

  • Gradual, natural-looking body contouring
cases.description:
CoolSculpting (Cryolipolysis)

CoolSculpting is a non-surgical body contouring treatment that targets and destroys fat cells through a cooling process known as cryolipolysis. Once frozen, the fat cells are naturally eliminated by the body over time. The procedure is FDA-cleared and effective for reducing localized fat bulges, offering a more sculpted appearance without the need for surgery. It’s safe, painless, and requires no recovery time, making it a convenient option for busy lifestyles.
cases.content:
CoolSculpting (Cryolipolysis)

Once frozen, the fat cells are naturally eliminated by the body over time. cases.title: Tummy Tuck (Abdominoplasty)
cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
A tummy tuck, or abdominoplasty, is a surgical procedure that removes excess fat and loose skin from the abdomen while also tightening weakened or separated abdominal muscles. It’s ideal for individuals who have experienced significant weight loss or pregnancy and want a flatter, firmer stomach.

How long it lasts:
Results are long-lasting—typically permanent if you maintain a stable weight and healthy lifestyle.

Results:

  • Flatter, tighter, more toned abdomen

  • Removal of loose or sagging skin

  • Improved body contour and posture
cases.description:
Tummy Tuck (Abdominoplasty)

A tummy tuck is a cosmetic surgery designed to reshape and firm the abdominal area by removing excess skin and fat and tightening the underlying muscles. It’s especially beneficial for individuals who have stretched or sagging abdominal skin due to aging, pregnancy, or major weight loss. The procedure results in a smoother, more sculpted midsection and can also help improve posture and core strength. Recovery time varies, but the long-term results can be transformative with proper care.
cases.content:

cases.title: Hair Transplant Surgery
cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
Hair transplant surgery restores hair in thinning or balding areas by moving healthy hair follicles from a donor site (usually the back or sides of the scalp) to areas with hair loss. The two main techniques are FUE (Follicular Unit Extraction) and FUT (Follicular Unit Transplantation). It’s ideal for treating male or female pattern baldness.

How long it lasts:
Transplanted hair is permanent and lasts a lifetime, although natural hair around it may continue to thin with age.

Results:

  • Natural-looking hair growth

  • Increased hair density and coverage

  • Permanent solution for bald or thinning areas
cases.description:
Hair Transplant Surgery

Hair transplant surgery is a permanent hair restoration solution that involves relocating hair follicles from areas with dense growth to thinning or balding regions. The procedure can be done using advanced techniques like FUE or FUT, both of which deliver natural-looking, long-lasting results. It’s a popular choice for individuals seeking to restore hairline, fill in bald patches, or add volume to thinning hair. Over time, the transplanted hair grows just like natural hair, blending seamlessly with existing strands.

cases.title: Eyelid Surgery
cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
Eyelid surgery, also known as blepharoplasty, removes excess skin, fat, and muscle from the upper and/or lower eyelids. It helps reduce puffiness, drooping eyelids, and under-eye bags, giving the eyes a more youthful, alert appearance. It can also improve peripheral vision if sagging skin obstructs the field of view.

How long it lasts:
Results are long-lasting—typically 5 to 10 years or more. In many cases, the procedure only needs to be done once.

Results:

  • Brighter, more youthful-looking eyes

  • Reduced sagging, puffiness, and under-eye bags

  • Improved vision in some cases (upper eyelid surgery)
cases.description:
Eyelid Surgery (Blepharoplasty)

Blepharoplasty is a cosmetic surgical procedure designed to rejuvenate the appearance of the eyes by removing or repositioning excess skin, fat, and tissue from the upper and/or lower eyelids. It addresses concerns like drooping eyelids, under-eye bags, and puffiness that often come with aging. The procedure results in a refreshed, more open-eyed appearance and may also restore clearer vision if excess upper lid skin obstructs sight. Recovery is typically quick, and results are long-lasting.
cases.content:
Eyelid Surgery (Blepharoplasty)

Recovery is typically quick, and results are long-lasting.

cases.title: Lip Augmentation
cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
Lip augmentation enhances the volume, shape, and symmetry of the lips using injectable dermal fillers—usually made with hyaluronic acid. It’s a quick, non-surgical treatment that can add fullness, define the lip borders, and smooth out fine lines around the mouth.

How long it lasts:
Results typically last 6 to 12 months, depending on the type of filler used and individual metabolism.

Results:

  • Fuller, more defined lips

  • Improved lip symmetry and shape

  • Soft, natural-looking enhancement with minimal downtime
cases.description:
Lip Augmentation (Dermal Fillers)

Lip augmentation is a cosmetic procedure designed to enhance the appearance of the lips by adding volume and definition. Using hyaluronic acid-based dermal fillers, this non-surgical treatment can create fuller, more youthful-looking lips while maintaining a soft and natural feel. The procedure is quick, with immediate results and little to no recovery time, making it a popular choice for those seeking subtle or dramatic lip enhancement.

cases.title: Jawline Contouring
cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
Jawline contouring with dermal fillers enhances and defines the jawline by adding volume and structure using injectable fillers like hyaluronic acid. It creates a more sculpted, symmetrical, and balanced lower face without surgery. It's popular for both men and women looking to sharpen a soft or sagging jawline.

How long it lasts:
Results typically last 12 to 18 months, depending on the type of filler used and individual metabolism.

Results:

  • Sharper, more defined jawline

  • Improved facial symmetry

  • Immediate, natural-looking enhancement with no downtime
cases.description:
Jawline Contouring (Dermal Fillers)

Jawline contouring with dermal fillers is a non-surgical cosmetic procedure that enhances the shape and definition of the jaw. By strategically injecting fillers into key areas, this treatment creates a stronger, more contoured jawline, helping to reduce the appearance of jowls and improve facial balance. The procedure is quick, with immediate results and minimal recovery time, making it a popular choice for those seeking a sharper, more sculpted profile.

cases.title: Spider & Varicose Vein Treatment
cases.main_before_alt: Before photo - Spider & Varicose Vein Treatment
cases.main_after_alt: After photo - Spider & Varicose Vein Treatment
cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
Sclerotherapy treats visible spider veins and small varicose veins by injecting a solution directly into the vein. This solution causes the vein to collapse and fade over time, improving both appearance and comfort. It’s commonly done on the legs and is minimally invasive with little to no downtime.

How long it lasts:
Treated veins usually disappear in 3–6 weeks (for spider veins) or 3–4 months (for larger veins). Results are long-lasting, though new veins may develop over time and require maintenance treatments.

Results:

  • Visibly clearer, smoother legs

  • Reduced pain or heaviness from varicose veins

  • Boost in confidence when wearing shorts or dresses
cases.beforeAlt: Before photo - Spider & Varicose Vein Treatment
cases.afterAlt: After photo - Spider & Varicose Vein Treatment
cases.description:
Sclerotherapy
Sclerotherapy is a non-surgical procedure used to reduce the appearance of spider veins and small varicose veins, especially in the legs. A medical solution is injected directly into the affected veins, causing them to shrink, collapse, and eventually be reabsorbed by the body. The procedure is quick and relatively painless, with minimal downtime. Over time, the treated veins fade, leaving the skin looking clearer and more even-toned.
cases.content:
Sclerotherapy

cases.title: Eyelid Surgery
cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
Blepharoplasty is a cosmetic surgical procedure that improves the appearance of the upper and/or lower eyelids. It involves removing excess skin, fat, and muscle from the eyelids to reduce puffiness, sagging, and under-eye bags. This procedure helps refresh tired-looking eyes and can also improve vision if sagging skin obstructs sight.

How long it lasts:
Results are long-lasting—typically 5 to 10 years or more, depending on skin aging and lifestyle factors.

Results:

  • More youthful, alert eye appearance

  • Reduced puffiness and drooping

  • Smoother, tighter skin around the eyes
cases.description:
Blepharoplasty (Eyelid Surgery)

Blepharoplasty is a cosmetic surgical procedure that enhances the appearance of the eyes by removing excess skin, fat, and muscle from the upper or lower eyelids. It is commonly performed to address sagging upper eyelids, puffiness, and under-eye bags that develop with age. The procedure not only refreshes and rejuvenates the eye area but can also improve vision in cases where drooping skin interferes with sight. The result is a more youthful, rested, and alert look.

Blepharoplasty (Eyelid Surgery)

cases.title: Skin care
cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
Skin rejuvenation treatments target various skin concerns such as fine lines, wrinkles, dullness, acne scars, sun damage, and uneven tone. Depending on the method used (like laser therapy, chemical peels, or microneedling), these treatments work by exfoliating dead skin cells, boosting collagen production, and promoting new skin cell growth.

How long it lasts:
Results vary based on the type of procedure:

  • Chemical peels: Last several months; maintenance peels recommended

  • Microneedling: Results last about 4–6 months

  • Laser treatments: Can last 1–2 years with proper skincare
    Multiple sessions may be needed for best results.

Results:

  • Smoother, brighter, more even-toned skin

  • Reduced fine lines, scars, and pigmentation

  • Fresher, younger-looking appearance
cases.description:
Skin Rejuvenation

Skin rejuvenation refers to a range of non-surgical cosmetic treatments designed to improve the texture, tone, and overall appearance of the skin. Common procedures include chemical peels, laser therapy, microneedling, and radiofrequency treatments. These methods help reduce signs of aging, such as fine lines, sun damage, uneven pigmentation, and acne scars. By stimulating collagen production and promoting cell turnover, skin rejuvenation leaves the skin looking smoother, fresher, and more youthful.
cases.content:
Skin Rejuvenation

cases.title: Teeth Whitening
cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
Teeth whitening is a cosmetic dental procedure that lightens and removes stains or discoloration from the teeth. It can be done professionally at a dental clinic or with at-home kits. Whitening treatments use bleaching agents like hydrogen peroxide or carbamide peroxide to brighten the enamel and improve the overall appearance of your smile.

How long it lasts:
Results typically last 6 months to 2 years, depending on your diet, oral hygiene, and lifestyle habits (like smoking or drinking coffee).

Results:

  • Brighter, whiter smile

  • Removes surface and deep stains

  • Boosts confidence and overall appearance
cases.description:
Teeth Whitening

Teeth whitening is a popular cosmetic dental treatment that helps brighten and whiten discolored or stained teeth. Using safe bleaching agents, the procedure removes surface and deep-set stains caused by coffee, tea, smoking, or aging. It can be done professionally at a dental office or with at-home kits, delivering noticeable results in just one session or over a few days, depending on the method. The result is a cleaner, more radiant smile that enhances overall appearance and boosts confidence.

Teeth Whitening

cases.title: Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL
cases.main_before_alt: Before photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL
cases.main_after_alt: After photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL

image_pairs.beforeAlt: Before photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL
image_pairs.afterAlt: After photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL

image_pairs.beforeAlt: Before photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL
image_pairs.afterAlt: After photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL

cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
A BBL enhances the size, shape, and contour of the buttocks by using your own body fat. Fat is removed from areas like the stomach or thighs via liposuction, processed, and then injected into the buttocks for a fuller, rounder look.

How long it lasts:
Results can last for several years, often 5 years or more, depending on lifestyle, weight fluctuations, and how much of the fat survives (typically around 60–80%).

Results:

  • More lifted, fuller butt

  • Natural-looking enhancement

  • Slimmer appearance in liposuctioned areas
cases.beforeAlt: Before photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL
cases.afterAlt: After photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL

imagePairs.beforeAlt: Before photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL
imagePairs.afterAlt: After photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL

imagePairs.beforeAlt: Before photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL
imagePairs.afterAlt: After photo - Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL

cases.description:
Buttock Augmentation (Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL)

Buttock augmentation, commonly known as a Brazilian Butt Lift (BBL), is a cosmetic procedure designed to enhance the shape and volume of the buttocks. It involves removing fat from areas like the abdomen, thighs, or flanks through liposuction, purifying it, and then injecting it into the buttocks. This natural fat transfer technique helps achieve a fuller, more lifted appearance without implants. The results are typically long-lasting and create a more contoured, balanced body silhouette.
cases.content:
Buttock Augmentation (Brazilian Butt Lift – BBL)

This natural fat transfer technique helps achieve a fuller, more lifted appearance without implants. The results are typically long-lasting and create a more contoured, balanced body silhouette.

cases.title: Frown lines
cases.procedure_info:
What it does:
Botox temporarily paralyzes the facial muscles that cause wrinkles—especially dynamic wrinkles like:

  • Forehead lines

  • Crow's feet (around the eyes)

  • Frown lines (between the eyebrows)

How long it lasts:
Typically 3–4 months.

Results:

  • Smoother skin

  • Reduced appearance of fine lines

  • A refreshed, younger look

Would you like to know about alternatives like dermal fillers or laser treatments too?
cases.description:
Botox for Wrinkle Reduction
Botox is a non-surgical cosmetic procedure used to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. It works by temporarily relaxing the facial muscles that cause expression lines, such as forehead creases, frown lines, and crow’s feet. The treatment is quick, typically taking less than 30 minutes, and results become noticeable within a few days. Effects usually last for 3 to 4 months, leaving the skin looking smoother, more youthful, and refreshed.
cases.content:
Botox for Wrinkle Reduction
Botox is a non-surgical cosmetic procedure used to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. It works by temporarily relaxing the facial muscles that cause expression lines, such as forehead creases, frown lines, and crow’s feet. The treatment is quick, typically taking less than 30 minutes, and results become noticeable within a few days. Effects usually last for 3 to 4 months, leaving the skin looking smoother, more youthful, and refreshed.
cases.procedureInfo:
What it does:
Botox temporarily paralyzes the facial muscles that cause wrinkles—especially dynamic wrinkles like:

  • Forehead lines

  • Crow’s feet (around the eyes)

  • Frown lines (between the eyebrows)

How long it lasts:
Typically 3–4 months.

Results:

  • Smoother skin

  • Reduced appearance of fine lines

  • A refreshed, younger look

Would you like to know about alternatives like dermal fillers or laser treatments too?

cases.title: Botox injections
cases.description:
What is it?

Botox (short for Botulinum toxin) is a non-surgical treatment used to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, especially on the forehead, around the eyes (crow’s feet), and between the eyebrows (frown lines).

How it works:

Botox temporarily paralyzes the underlying muscles that cause wrinkles, giving the skin a smoother and more youthful appearance.

cases.title: Advanced Nose Reshaping
cases.procedure_info:
Benefits of Advanced Nose Reshaping

✅ Improved Facial Balance
Achieve a more harmonious facial profile by adjusting nose shape, size, or contour.

✅ Non-Surgical Options Available
Quick, minimally invasive procedures like dermal fillers offer subtle improvements with no downtime.

✅ Correct Functional Issues
In addition to cosmetic benefits, reshaping can improve breathing and correct structural problems like a deviated septum.

✅ Boosted Confidence
Feel more comfortable and self-assured in your appearance with results designed to complement your face.

✅ Personalized Treatment Plans
Every nose and face is different—your treatment is customized to ensure results that align with your goals.
cases.description: Discover a more confident you with Advanced Nose Reshaping, a customized approach to enhancing the natural balance and symmetry of your face. Whether you’re seeking subtle refinement or a more noticeable change, our expert treatments—surgical or non-surgical—are tailored to match your unique features and goals. With precision techniques and a deep understanding of facial aesthetics, we help you achieve results that look natural and feel authentic.
